fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Rent is collected when the space owner passes another player: that player pays rent.
- All players the space owner passes on their turn move to the space owner's space at the end of the space owner's turn. The victim gains an extra d8 their following turn for every turn they paid rent to the space owner in a row squared.
- Players who own any property from this set gain an extra d3 each turn.
- If spawned, so will the **_56 Hook**
- The **_44 Hospital** cannot spawn.
